https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uEDdzt1ZTB1BRo95gMkBytl0NqM.jpg A cynical Anti-American Hollywood filmmaker sets out on a crusade to abolish the 4th of July holiday. He is visited by three spirits who take him on a hilarious journey in an attempt to show him the true meaning of America. An American Carol
